string.value: To Victoria Island
Your training continues. You must keep progressing until the Black Mage is defeated once and for all. You should ask #b#p1201000##k what to do next.

#p1201000# says you can only train so much in #m140000000# and suggests you venture to #bVictoria Island#k. She directs you to an ally of hers, #b#p1002104# the Information Dealer#k, in #b#m104000004##k.\r\n\r\nIn order to reach #m104000000#, you must leave #m140000000# by boarding a ship. From town, head to your right and continue past the snow-covered field to arrive at a small port operated by penguins. Once there, talk to #b#p1200003##k to board the ship.

#p1002104# the Information Dealer was once a resident of #m140000000# eagerly awaiting the Hero's revival, but he eventually lost hope and left town. He's a distant cousin of #p1201000#. He must have felt bad about leaving #p1201000# all by herself, because he promised to help #p1002104# anytime she needed it.
In order to become stronger, you must experience more worldly things, which means you should expand your horizon by leaving this island. Staying here in #m140000000# will only get you so far.
Press #bW#k to open the world map. You'll see the whole world that you have forgotten, the world which you had fought so hard to save. Of all the places listed here, you should…

...head over to #bVictoria Island#k first. There you'll be able to meet new people, battle different types of monsters, and gain invaluable experiences. Since you have lost all of your memory, your mind should be a blank canvas right now. Use this experience to soak up as much as you can, so that the next time you face the Black Mage, you will be able to look at him in the eye and not even flinch.

There's actually a person there in Victoria Island that should be able to help you on your journey. Mr. Truth, or #b#p1002104##k, as he's called by the outside world, should be there. He's an #bInformation Dealer#k in #m104000000#. Take this letter, and he'll recognize you at once.

Finding #b#m104000000##k in Victoria Island is easy. Exit the town to the right, then walk past the snowy forest and you'll see a small #bharbor#k which the penguins operate. There, strike a conversation with #b#p1200003##k and get on board.
I notified #p1200003# in advance not to charge you a fee, since it's your first time. Once the ship reaches #m104000000#, find your way towards #b#m104000004##k where you'll find #p1002104#.
I'll be waiting for you here, hoping that the next time I see you, you'll be that much stronger and more powerful than before.

Are you here to buy some valuable information? Hmmm? Is this… #t4032338#? Are you from #m140000000#? But the only human being that lives there is #p1201000#... Are you from somewhere else? Wait, no other person would dare to go there... so how did you...? Wait. Let me read this letter first.

…I can't believe it. I'm standing in front of a hero. I used to live on that island myself, and I also used to believe the prophecy, but… oh my goodness. #p1201000#'s wishes have finally come true. What? You want to know what I was just talking about?

After discovering the Book of Prophecy, our race has been bracing for your inevitable resurrection for hundreds of years… all in that tiny island with nothing but ice… but the hero never came, and we've been slowly losing our faith in the prophecy.

In the end, most people left #m140000000#, tired of waiting for the prophecy that never came true. I just hope you don't blame them for leaving. They had to do what they had to do, you know. But, that being said…

#p1201000# was the one person that never lost hope, and stayed in #m140000000# long after everyone else left, holding onto the belief that the hero will someday come back and save us. Even after her #bolder brother#k left the island. That's one stubborn kid, I tell you.

But now that you're here, that stubborness has been rewarded. Thank you for coming back. Now I can look #p1201000# in the eye again. I have felt so bad for not being of any support to her, even though we are cousins.
Just tell me what you want to do, and I'll be there to help. Not just because you're the hero in our eyes, but also because you've validated #p1201000#.
You still haven't gone to #m104000000##k in #bVictoria Island? Just head east past town until you reach the #bharbor#k, then get on board the ship. The first ride will be free, so no worries there.

Hmmm? Are you here to purchase some valuable information? But I do have a rule here with the sales of information. I do not sell information to anyone that does not have a letter of introduction with them. Sorry, but I need you to #bget a letter of introduction from someone you know#k.
Oh no, did you lose the letter? Without it, no one will believe that you are a hero… I'll write you another one, and please don't lose it this time.
